flavor: The hue of your soul, the voice of your spirit, the shape of your flesh are yours to decide. Be free.
printed_text: 0[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: 0 credits: Break 1 barrier subroutine. Use this ability only once per turn.

flavor: I'm through with games.
printed_text: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1[credit] more to rez.
stripped_printed_text: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1 credit more to rez.

flavor:
"If you're not in position to press the advantage, you'll never gain the upper hand."
—The Playbook
printed_text:
Play only if you made a successful run this turn.
Trash 1 unrezzed piece of ice you passed during your last run.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if you made a successful run this turn. Trash 1 unrezzed piece of ice you passed during your last run.

flavor: Someone's trash is another's treasure.
printed_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.
stripped_printed_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.

flavor: Surprising, how a single blocked datafeed brings the system to its knees.
printed_text:
The Corp cannot score an agenda during the same turn they installed that agenda.
When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
stripped_printed_text: The Corp cannot score an agenda during the same turn they installed that agenda. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.

flavor:
"Oh, holy Rust,
Turn foundation into dust.
Oh, sacred Flood,
Wash away what we have become."
—Rent Strike
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.

flavor: Just don't let it bounce back up the feed to your rig.
printed_text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Access → Hosted virus counter: Trash the card you are accessing. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Access -> Hosted virus counter: Trash the card you are accessing. Use this ability only once per turn.

flavor: What is another mask to those we already wear?
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine.

flavor: At the code level, all ice manifests via a small number of common protocols. Security managers are kept awake by nightmares of a disgruntled sysop walking out the door with the core infosec library.
printed_text: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets -1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets -1 strength.

flavor: Money is like gravity, it accretes. Justice is like resisting gravity, it takes force.
printed_text:
When you install this resource, load 16[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
[click]: Take 4[credit] from this resource.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this resource, load 16 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Take 4 credits from this resource.

flavor: Destruction is forever.
printed_text: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
stripped_printed_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.

flavor:
Nobles born foolish cared not for their state
I was left alone weeping
—Toghon Temur
printed_text: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1 credit.

flavor: Live in the fast lane.
printed_text: The first time each turn you play a run event, gain 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you play a run event, gain 1 credit.

flavor: Yeah. I'm thinking I'm back.
printed_text: The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, you may choose 2 cards in your heap. If you do, the Corp removes 1 of those cards from the game, then you add the other card to your grip.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, you may choose 2 cards in your heap. If you do, the Corp removes 1 of those cards from the game, then you add the other card to your grip.

flavor: "I see great opportunities ahead for you."
printed_text: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3[credit] less.
stripped_printed_text: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3 credits less.

flavor:
"Did you order the defrag?"
"...I thought you did?"
printed_text:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. Derez 1 installed piece of ice.

flavor:
"Electronic warfare, like all warfare, is based on deception."
—The Playbook
printed_text: Choose 1 unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp may rez that ice. If they do not, they trash it.
stripped_printed_text: Choose 1 unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp may rez that ice. If they do not, they trash it.

flavor: "I'm not an actor, but I am a professional." —Gabriel Santiago
printed_text: Run any server. The first time this run you encounter a piece of ice, bypass it.
stripped_printed_text: Run any server. The first time this run you encounter a piece of ice, bypass it.

flavor: Go outside. Work with your hands. It'll do you good.
printed_text: Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.
stripped_printed_text: Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.

flavor: It's not what you know. It's who you know.
printed_text: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1[credit] to add this event to your grip.
stripped_printed_text: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1 credit to add this event to your grip.

flavor: Slippier than a buttered escargot.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. [trash]: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength. trash: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.

flavor: Her touch is as cold as her heart.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1[credit] for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1 credit for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.

flavor: There is no such thing as truly disconnected from the Net.
printed_text: [click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
stripped_printed_text: click: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.

flavor: They pay you for the practice run, then you do it again for the real reward.
printed_text:
When your turn begins, you may choose a server.
The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, gain 2[credit].
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a server. The first time each turn you make a successful run on the chosen server, instead of breaching it, gain 2 credits.

printed_text: Before drawing your starting hand, set aside the top 6 cards of your stack facedown. (You may look at those cards at any time.) Shuffle 2 of those cards into your stack. [click]: Add 1 card set aside with this identity to your grip.
stripped_printed_text: Before drawing your starting hand, set aside the top 6 cards of your stack facedown. (You may look at those cards at any time.) Shuffle 2 of those cards into your stack. click: Add 1 card set aside with this identity to your grip.

flavor: My thoughts open; unbound within, unblocked without.
printed_text: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.

flavor: No Diesel? No fire!
printed_text: Draw 3 cards.
stripped_printed_text: Draw 3 cards.

flavor: No code survives contact with the user.
printed_text: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack if you searched it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
stripped_printed_text: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack if you searched it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.

flavor: The incoming datafeed is blunted, rendered into a soft lie our brains can understand. Seeing the Reality beyond takes dedication and practice.
printed_text: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
stripped_printed_text: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.

flavor: I do not run with my tools. I run with my heart.
printed_text:
When you install this program, you may pay X[credit] to place X power counters on it.
This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength.
Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this program, you may pay X credits to place X power counters on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine.

flavor: I saved it to my desktop once; couldn't find the thing for a week!
printed_text: When you install this program, choose barrier, code gate, or sentry. When your discard phase ends, add this program to your grip. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has the chosen subtype.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this program, choose barrier, code gate, or sentry. When your discard phase ends, add this program to your grip. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice that has the chosen subtype.

flavor:
"Pallas Athena sent a heron gliding down the night. They could not see it passing, but they heard its cry."
—The Iliad
printed_text: Install only on a rezzed piece of ice. Host ice gains barrier, code gate, and sentry.
stripped_printed_text: Install only on a rezzed piece of ice. Host ice gains barrier, code gate, and sentry.

flavor: A thousand puzzles with a single solution.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

flavor: A rising tide drowns all servers.
printed_text: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs of assets.
stripped_printed_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs of assets.

flavor: If you have something to sell, Aesop is interested in buying. The only detail he won't ask is where you got it.
printed_text: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3[credit].
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3 credits.

flavor: You can hack a social network, but hard work, collaboration, and a sympathetic ear gets you there faster.
printed_text: [click]: Gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: click: Gain 1 credit and draw 1 card.

flavor: I thought I'd feel bad about this. I don't.
printed_text: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was successful, gain 5[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was successful, gain 5 credits.

flavor: They were off the market for years, till the Beanstalk Crisis made redundancy fashionable again.
printed_text: 1[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.
stripped_printed_text: 1 recurring credit (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.

flavor: The best view in the system. Priced accordingly.
printed_text:
When you install this resource, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, remove 1 hosted power counter and draw 2 cards.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this resource, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, remove 1 hosted power counter and draw 2 cards.

flavor: Service is Guaranteed.
printed_text: The first time each turn the Runner passes a rezzed piece of bioroid ice, you may rez 1 bioroid card, paying 4[credit] less.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn the Runner passes a rezzed piece of bioroid ice, you may rez 1 bioroid card, paying 4 credits less.

flavor: Perfection of form.
printed_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
stripped_printed_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

flavor: They only get one childhood. Make it count.
printed_text: When you rez this asset, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this asset. [interrupt] → When this asset would be trashed, you may shuffle it into R&D instead of adding it to Archives. (It is still considered trashed.)
stripped_printed_text: When you rez this asset, load 8 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from this asset. Interrupt -> When this asset would be trashed, you may shuffle it into R&D instead of adding it to Archives. (It is still considered trashed.)

flavor: Hello again! Back for another game?
printed_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: A triumph of bioroid-driven iterative design. A pity no one understands how it works...
printed_text:
When you rez this ice, choose 1 installed program hosted on a piece of ice. Move that program onto this ice.
Each hosted program loses all abilities.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: When you rez this ice, choose 1 installed program hosted on a piece of ice. Move that program onto this ice. Each hosted program loses all abilities. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: I roar with a thousand voices, wield a thousand weapons, remember a thousand lives.
printed_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Resolve 1 subroutine on another rezzed bioroid ice. [subroutine] Resolve 1 subroutine on another rezzed bioroid ice.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Resolve 1 subroutine on another rezzed bioroid ice. Subroutine Resolve 1 subroutine on another rezzed bioroid ice.

flavor: Click!
printed_text:
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: It's not sleep. Sleep is dreams, activity, change. These are still, cold, dead.
printed_text: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
stripped_printed_text: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

flavor: Sometimes we at Haas-Bioroid are asked how well bioroids interface socially with human workforces. Thanks to our tireless efforts, we believe this will not be a problem in the long term.
printed_text: Gain [click][click].
stripped_printed_text: Gain click click.

flavor: Problem solved.
printed_text: X[credit], [trash]: Choose 1 rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. That ice gets +X strength for the remainder of the turn.
stripped_printed_text: X credits, trash: Choose 1 rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. That ice gets +X strength for the remainder of the turn.

flavor: The Essence of You.
printed_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, do 1 net damage.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, do 1 net damage.

flavor: The payment for entry is a mere drop of blood.
printed_text: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: Do 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run and only once per run.
stripped_printed_text: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: Do 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run and only once per run.

flavor: We could stop disasters before they happen, murderers before they act. Surely that's worth an android's sanity?
printed_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: End the run.
stripped_printed_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: End the run.

flavor: I cannot stay. There is something I must do.
printed_text:
You can advance this asset.
[click], [trash]: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.
stripped_printed_text: You can advance this asset. click, trash: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.

flavor: A little room, full of surprises.
printed_text:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4[credit]. If you do, give the Runner 1 tag and do 3 net damage.
stripped_printed_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4 credits. If you do, give the Runner 1 tag and do 3 net damage.

flavor: As the white light blazed around her, she became still. It was too beautiful. Too perfect.
printed_text:
The strength of this ice cannot be lowered.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: The strength of this ice cannot be lowered. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: The pain of its first cutting art is a test. Bleed human-red and the second attack is stilled.
printed_text: The Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed AI program. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
stripped_printed_text: The Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. Subroutine Trash 1 installed AI program. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.

flavor: We knew we'd found this season's must-have when all twenty of the A-tier influencers refused to return the teacup alpacas.
printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Reveal up to 5 cards in HQ. Gain 2[credit] for each card you revealed this way.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Reveal up to 5 cards in HQ. Gain 2 credits for each card you revealed this way.

flavor: Are you watching closely?
printed_text: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.
stripped_printed_text: Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.

flavor: Director Kase hung landscapes of the Hokusai facility behind their desk. The implication was wonderful for concentrating the minds of the staff.
printed_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, do 1 net damage. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, do 1 net damage. Limit 1 region per server.

flavor: Every Hour, Every Minute, Every Second.
printed_text: The first time each turn you create a remote server, draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you create a remote server, draw 1 card.

flavor: Alright everyone! The rights go live in exactly fourteen days. I want merch, I want tie-ins, I want sequels! Let's go!
printed_text: When you score this agenda, you may reveal 1 asset or upgrade in HQ or Archives. Install and rez that card, ignoring all costs.
stripped_printed_text: When you score this agenda, you may reveal 1 asset or upgrade in HQ or Archives. Install and rez that card, ignoring all costs.

flavor: Everything is data.
printed_text:
When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 hosted advancement counters past 3.
This agenda is worth 1 more agenda point for each hosted agenda counter.
stripped_printed_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 hosted advancement counters past 3. This agenda is worth 1 more agenda point for each hosted agenda counter.

flavor: Lead the market, never follow it.
printed_text: [interrupt] → The first time each turn you would draw any number of cards, increase the number of cards you will draw by 1. When you draw those cards, add 1 of them to the bottom of R&D.
stripped_printed_text: Interrupt -> The first time each turn you would draw any number of cards, increase the number of cards you will draw by 1. When you draw those cards, add 1 of them to the bottom of R&D.

flavor: Corporations can file chargebacks too.
printed_text:
You can advance this asset.
[click], [trash]: The Runner loses 4[credit] for each hosted advancement counter.
stripped_printed_text: You can advance this asset. click, trash: The Runner loses 4 credits for each hosted advancement counter.

flavor: A moment of your time? A moment of your time? A moment of your—
printed_text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 1 credit. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 1 credit.

flavor: The original Net pathways were free and open. An unacceptable state of affairs.
printed_text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they must pay 3[credit], if able. If they do not, end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they must pay 3 credits, if able. If they do not, end the run. Subroutine End the run.

flavor:
Space bent back. Folds on folds.
Endlessly wide. Paper deep.
printed_text: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: They know more about you than you do.

X must be equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has.
Place X advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
stripped_printed_text: X must be equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has. Place X advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.

flavor: The Coast is open for business.
printed_text: Each agenda in the root of this server gets -1 advancement requirement. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: Each agenda in the root of this server gets -1 advancement requirement. Limit 1 region per server.

flavor: Above the Competition.
printed_text: Whenever you play a transaction operation, gain 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you play a transaction operation, gain 1 credit.

flavor: Sometimes the small fry need a little convincing to put profit over principle.
printed_text: When you score this agenda, gain 7[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.
stripped_printed_text: When you score this agenda, gain 7 credits and take 1 bad publicity.

flavor: There's only one season in Oaktown: construction.
printed_text: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, gain 2[credit]. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters (including the counter just placed), gain 3[credit] instead.
stripped_printed_text: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, gain 2 credits. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters (including the counter just placed), gain 3 credits instead.

flavor: Next stop: infinity.
printed_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. Add it to HQ.
stripped_printed_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. Add it to HQ.

flavor: It's amazing what people will endure for job security.
printed_text:
As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda.
When your turn begins, you may trash 1 installed resource. Trashing a resource this way cannot be prevented.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda. When your turn begins, you may trash 1 installed resource. Trashing a resource this way cannot be prevented.

flavor: Target Acquired.

As an additional cost to rez this ice, forfeit 1 agenda.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.

If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead gain 4[credit]. [subroutine] End the run. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead search R&D for up to 2 cards. flavor: Each time I came back, it was bigger. And colder.
printed_text:
You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: "Don't think we don't care. We are very upset."

stripped_printed_text: Trace 5. If successful, do X meat damage. X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on all agendas the Runner stole during their last turn.

flavor: The Promontorium Agarum shipyards work on a scale that would be impossible in Earthgrav.
printed_text: Runs against this server cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause runs to become unsuccessful.) Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: Runs against this server cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause runs to become unsuccessful.) Limit 1 region per server.

flavor: Everyone bought the newest PAD. Retro styling is in!
printed_text: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit.

flavor: No runner sees the same thing. Some say it's a beast, others a man. But they all agree that it smells blue, and tastes like eternity.
printed_text:
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click].
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine The Runner loses click. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: You don't notice, but their profits do.
printed_text:
Gain 1[credit].
The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain [click].
When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
stripped_printed_text: Gain 1 credit. The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain click. When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
